item.description:
Napper Tandy's is a nice little bar located in Norwood. Every Saturday evening they have Karaoke in the dining room away from the bar. They have a great songlist, and a wonderful drink selection and wait staff!

Karaoke starts at 9 and goes until 12:30, and the bar closes at 1am. Come along and even if you don't want to sing, enjoy the show!

There is a parking lot dedicated to the bar located across Day Street.
item.how_to_find_us: As you enter the bar from the street, turn to the left and karaoke will be in this room.
item.name: Karaoke South (Norwood)
